name: MVP v0: Static-first, Telemetry-rich (No Login)
title: MVP v0: Static-first, Telemetry-rich
description: Simplest path to production - ship static content with rich telemetry to learn what to build next. No authentication, no ingestion pipeline, pure speed to market.
purpose: Validate content market fit and gather demand signals before investing in full platform features
trigger: Content creator completes ARTICLE.md and wants to publish to web platform

userStory.goal: Ship orchestration patterns to web with zero friction and maximum learning
userStory.benefit: Get traffic and telemetry immediately to inform next features, avoid premature optimization

movements.name: Content Creation (Offline)
movements.description: Human picks topic, AI researches and refines, produces ARTICLE.md

userStory.goal: Create high-quality orchestration pattern documentation
userStory.benefit: Produce canonical source artifact ready for conversion and deployment

beats.name: Human Identifies Topic

userStory.goal: Identify valuable topic from real-world pain points
userStory.benefit: Ensure pattern addresses actual market needs

when: Creator selects topic for pattern development

notes: Topics come from customer feedback, market observation, or operational experience

beats.name: AI Deep Research

externalSystem.description: AI-powered research to collect examples, metrics, edge cases, and industry context

userStory.goal: Gather comprehensive data to enrich pattern documentation
userStory.benefit: Provide evidence-based content with real examples and metrics

notes: Research phase is critical for quality and credibility

beats.name: AI Refinement Loop

userStory.goal: Create sequence diagrams and orchestrate problem/solution narrative
userStory.benefit: Achieve high quality documentation through iterative refinement

when: AI and human iterate on diagrams and narrative

notes: Multiple iterations expected until clarity and completeness achieved

beats.name: Generate ARTICLE.md

userStory.goal: Produce markdown article with embedded diagrams
userStory.benefit: Create canonical source artifact for all downstream conversions

then: Content includes As-Is and Orchestrated scenarios

notes: ARTICLE.md is the single source of truth

movements.name: Local Conversion & Metadata
movements.description: MarkdownViewer app converts MD to HTML and generates metadata

userStory.goal: Convert canonical markdown to web-ready HTML and extract metadata
userStory.benefit: Prepare all artifacts needed for static deployment

beats.name: Convert MD to HTML

userStory.goal: Parse ARTICLE.md and render HTML with styling and diagrams
userStory.benefit: Create web-ready HTML that users can view in browsers

given: ARTICLE.md file exists and is valid
then: HTML file generated with proper structure

notes: Uses Markdig library for markdown parsing
Mermaid.js for diagram rendering

beats.name: Generate pattern.json

userStory.goal: Extract structured metadata from markdown frontmatter
userStory.benefit: Enable discovery and filtering without backend database

notes: Schema: {slug, title, industries[], serviceTypes[], tags[], publishedUtc}

beats.name: Update catalog.json

userStory.goal: Maintain central index of all published patterns
userStory.benefit: Single JSON file powers entire discovery UX without database

notes: catalog.json is array of all pattern.json entries

movements.name: Azure Deployment
movements.description: Push static files to Azure for public access

userStory.goal: Upload all generated files to Azure CDN
userStory.benefit: Make patterns publicly accessible with global CDN distribution

movements.diagram: Local files â†’ Azure Storage upload â†’ CDN cache â†’ deployment verification

beats.name: Push to Azure Storage

userStory.goal: Upload HTML, assets, and metadata to Azure Storage Static Website
userStory.benefit: Patterns are live and accessible via CDN

notes: URL structure: /patterns/<slug>/index.html
Assets: /patterns/<slug>/assets/*
Content-Type: text/html, application/json, text/css, application/javascript
Cache: public, max-age=3600

beats.name: Verify Deployment

userStory.goal: Confirm URLs are accessible and content loads correctly
userStory.benefit: Catch deployment issues before users do

notes: Retry upload on failure
Report specific errors to console
